LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalAddress.label: royal address
LanguageData.VFEE_RoyalAddress.description: is giving a royal address from the throne.If all goes well, every titled participant will gain a small amount of honor, and they will gain honor for each titled participant. If it goes poorly, the speech will do social damage and will lose honor for each titled participant. The outcome depends on their social abilities. Imperial nobility currently residing in the area will join the speech and count as titled participants.
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowFreeholder.label: bestow: Freeholder
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowFreeholder.description: Bestows the Freeholder title on a selected pawn. That pawn receives 1 Honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Freeholder or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowYeoman.label: bestow: Yeoman
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowYeoman.description: Bestows the Yeoman title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 7 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Yeoman or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowAcolyte.label: bestow: Acolyte
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowAcolyte.description: Bestows the Acolyte title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 13 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Acolyte or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowKnight.label: bestow: Knight
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowKnight.description: Bestows the Knight/Dame title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 21 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Knight/Dame or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowPraetor.label: bestow: Praetor
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowPraetor.description: Bestows the Praetor title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 31 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Praetor or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowBaron.label: bestow: Baron
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowBaron.description: Bestows the Baron/Baroness title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 45 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Baron/Baroness or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowCount.label: bestow: Count
LanguageData.VFEE_BestowCount.description: Bestows the Count/Countess title on a selected pawn. That pawn now has 45 honor. Can’t be cast on a pawn that’s already a Count/Countess or higher. Has a 3 day cooldown.
